channel.title: Revolution Rpg
channel.description:
VISIT and sign up at the homepage for the game: http://www.cheatskape.com/RpgF/
This game is made by marcopolo8, don't let anyone make you think otherwise :D
[DOWNLOAD]The Client to Revolution Rpg http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/Client.zip You can also Click the small banner on the right.
[MUST DOWNLOAD THIS AND INSTALL FOR GAME TO WORK.] If the game errors the use the filelibary below and that should fix any problems you have when playing the game. http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/libraryfiles-1.exe
Some Features You Will Find In The Game Are:
â€¢ Character Selecter In Game â€¢ Portal system â€¢ Post Office â€¢ Guilds â€¢ Mining System â€¢ Bar Smelting/Smithing â€¢ Fishing â€¢ Boating / Boat Fishing â€¢ Picking â€¢ Player Houses / Members player Houses â€¢ Vishual Banking â€¢ Skill Menus â€¢ Player Killing â€¢ Many Classes To Pick From â€¢ Many Items, Spells,Weapons â€¢ Tons Of Npc's To Kill / Tons Of levels To Gain â€¢ HighScores (shows on forum)- Top 100 Players â€¢ Friendly Players And A Helpfull Staff â€¢ Moderators Pannel â€¢ Quests: Cooming Soon
Next Update Will Have A Mail System In Game, Members menu with the option to change your own sprites, Mod Pannel For ingame Mods. ( Will Release before June 10th)
Next Updates May Also Include: Pet System, Friends System, Little Bar Game Where Players Spin On The Bar Stools.
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v667/marcopolo8/login.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.cheatskape.com/RpgF/uploads2u/mainp.JPG[/img]
The Client to Revolution Rpg http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/Client.zip
If the game errors the use the filelibary below and that should fix any problems you have when playing the game. http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/libraryfiles-1.exe]
Full help section coming soon
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v667/marcopolo8/charselect.jpg[/img]

item.title: Revolution Rpg
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Link Not Working?
Comes Up With

[code] The page cannot be displayed
The page you are looking for is currently unavailable. The Web site might be experiencing technical difficulties, or you may need to adjust your browser settings.

Please try the following:

Click the Refresh button, or try again later.

If you typed the page address in the Address bar, make sure that it is spelled correctly.

To check your connection settings, click the Tools menu, and then click Internet Options. On the Connections tab, click Settings. The settings should match those provided by your local area network (LAN) administrator or Internet service provider (ISP).
If your Network Administrator has enabled it, Microsoft Windows can examine your network and automatically discover network connection settings.
If you would like Windows to try and discover them,
click Detect Network Settings
Some sites require 128-bit connection security. Click the Help menu and then click About Internet Explorer to determine what strength security you have installed.
If you are trying to reach a secure site, make sure your Security settings can support it. Click the Tools menu, and then click Internet Options. On the Advanced tab, scroll to the Security section and check settings for SSL 2.0, SSL 3.0, TLS 1.0, PCT 1.0.
Click the Back button to try another link.

Cannot find server or DNS Error
Internet Explorer
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Revolution Rpg
item.dc:creator: @l_wind_i l wind i
item.description:
@l_wind_i wrote:

[quote=“snowskater71, post:13, topic:4003”]Hellz yeeah!

Well, Anyone who even checked out the game knows there hasnt been an update since i posted this :mad: BUT! We have a team of mappers and quest writers mapping questable places to go and writing quests :rolleyes:

Some hints on things that are going to be new in a future update:

[ul][li]mouse clicking[/li]
[li]maps - quests[/li]
[li]weapons (maybe)[/li]
[li]And more to come!!! join Revolution Rpg NOW!!! [size=5pt]please XD[/size][/ul][/quote][quote=“snowskater71, post:13, topic:4003”]Hellz yeeah!

Well, Anyone who even checked out the game knows there hasnt been an update since i posted this :mad: BUT! We have a team of mappers and quest writers mapping questable places to go and writing quests :rolleyes:

Some hints on things that are going to be new in a future update:

[ul][li]mouse clicking[/li]
[li]maps - quests[/li]
[li]weapons (maybe)[/li]
[li]And more to come!!! join Revolution Rpg NOW!!! [size=5pt]please XD[/size][/ul][/quote]

Yes basically what he is saying there will be alot of updates to make it more like RSC.

Read full topic

item.title: Revolution Rpg
item.dc:creator: @snowskater71 snowskater71
item.description:
@snowskater71 wrote:

VISIT and sign up at the homepage for the game: http://www.cheatskape.com/RpgF/

This game is made by marcopolo8, don’t let anyone make you think otherwise

[DOWNLOAD]The Client to Revolution Rpg
http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/Client.zip
You can also Click the small banner on the right.

[MUST DOWNLOAD THIS AND INSTALL FOR GAME TO WORK.] If the game errors the use the filelibary below and that should fix any problems you have when playing the game.
http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/libraryfiles-1.exe

Some Features You Will Find In The Game Are:

â€¢ Character Selecter In Game
â€¢ Portal system
â€¢ Post Office
â€¢ Guilds
â€¢ Mining System
â€¢ Bar Smelting/Smithing
â€¢ Fishing
â€¢ Boating / Boat Fishing
â€¢ Picking
â€¢ Player Houses / Members player Houses
â€¢ Vishual Banking
â€¢ Skill Menus
â€¢ Player Killing
â€¢ Many Classes To Pick From
â€¢ Many Items, Spells,Weapons
â€¢ Tons Of Npc’s To Kill / Tons Of levels To Gain
â€¢ HighScores (shows on forum)- Top 100 Players
â€¢ Friendly Players And A Helpfull Staff
â€¢ Moderators Pannel
â€¢ Quests: Cooming Soon

Next Update Will Have A Mail System In Game, Members menu with the option to change your own sprites, Mod Pannel For ingame Mods. ( Will Release before June 10th)

Next Updates May Also Include: Pet System, Friends System, Little Bar Game Where Players Spin On The Bar Stools.

The Client to Revolution Rpg
http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/Client.zip

If the game errors the use the filelibary below and that should fix any problems you have when playing the game.
http://www.cheatskape.com/revolution/libraryfiles-1.exe]
